text: 13:22 Matyu 6:19-34; Luk 12:16-21; 1 Timoti 6:9-10; 6:17Ezɨ witɨn ovɨzir benir dɨkonibar tongɨn ireziba, kar gumazamiziba Godɨn akam baraghava, egha uaghan nguazir kamɨn osɨmtɨzibagh nɨghnɨgha, uaghan dagɨar avɨriba iniasa nɨghnɨsi. Ezɨ bizir kaba Godɨn akaba ikiagharɨghizɨma da mɨsevir puvatɨ.
